title: Basic Insert and Validation Test
description: This test case verifies a basic INSERT operation into the 'test_table' table. After inserting a new record, the test performs a SELECT query to validate that the data has been correctly inserted.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Perform an INSERT operation to add a new user record with 'name', 'age', and 'code'.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, code FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Run a SELECT query to retrieve and validate the inserted user record based on 'name' and 'age'.

success_message: User record successfully inserted and validated.
failure_message: Failed to validate the inserted user record. Data mismatch or insertion error.

title: Upsert Operation with Validation
description: This test case verifies the upsert operation by performing two consecutive INSERT operations with different values for the same primary key. The second insert should overwrite the first. A SELECT query is executed to validate that the latest inserted value is present.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Initial upsert - Insert record with initial 'code' value.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Upsert (overwrite) - Insert with the same key but update 'code' value.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, code FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate the upsert by selecting the record and ensuring 'code' reflects the latest value.

success_message: Upsert operation successfully validated. Latest 'code' value is present.
failure_message: Upsert validation failed. The 'code' value does not reflect the latest insert, indicating an issue with the upsert logic.

title: Insert and Validate Collection Data
description: This test case validates the insertion of records containing collection data types, such as sets and maps. The test inserts a record with collection fields ('tags' and 'extra_info') and performs a SELECT query to ensure the data is correctly stored and retrieved.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, tags, extra_info) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with collection fields - 'tags' (set) and 'extra_info' (map).

operations.query: SELECT name, age, code, tags, extra_info FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Retrieve and validate the inserted record with collection fields.

success_message: Collection data inserted and validated successfully.
failure_message: Validation failed for collection data. The retrieved record does not match the expected values.

title: Insert and Validate with Future Timestamp
description: This test case inserts a record with a future timestamp into the 'test_table' table. A subsequent SELECT query is performed to ensure the data is correctly inserted and retrievable after the future timestamp becomes valid.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, tags, extra_info) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?) USING TIMESTAMP ?
operations.query_desc: Insert record with a future timestamp and collection fields ('tags' and 'extra_info').

operations.query: SELECT name, age, code, tags, extra_info FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate that the record with the future timestamp is retrievable after insertion.

success_message: Record with future timestamp successfully inserted and validated.
failure_message: Validation failed for record with future timestamp. The data may not be available yet or an issue occurred during insertion.

title: Insert and Validate with Past Timestamp
description: This test case inserts a record with a past timestamp into the 'test_table' table and validates its presence through a SELECT query.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, tags, extra_info) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?) USING TIMESTAMP ?
operations.query_desc: Insert record with past timestamp and collection fields.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, code, tags, extra_info FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate the inserted record with past timestamp.

success_message: Record with past timestamp inserted and validated successfully.
failure_message: Failed to validate record with past timestamp.

title: Insert and Validate Record with All Supported Datatypes
description: This test case inserts a record into the 'user_info' table with all supported datatypes and validates its presence through a SELECT query to ensure correct insertion.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited, balance, is_active, birth_date, zip_code, extra_info, map_text_int, map_text_bigint, map_text_boolean, map_text_ts, map_text_float, map_text_double, ts_text_map, ts_boolean_map, ts_float_map, ts_double_map, ts_bigint_map, ts_ts_map, ts_int_map, tags, set_boolean, set_int, set_bigint, set_float, set_double, set_timestamp) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with all supported datatypes.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, code, credited FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate the inserted record by selecting and comparing all values.

success_message: Record with all datatypes inserted and validated successfully.
failure_message: Failed to validate record with all datatypes or data mismatch found.

title: Insert with IF NOT EXISTS and Validation
description: This test case inserts a record using the IF NOT EXISTS clause to ensure that duplicate records are not inserted. A subsequent attempt to insert the same record with a different value will be ignored. The validation step ensures the initial insert remains unchanged.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?) IF NOT EXISTS
operations.query_desc: Insert record using IF NOT EXISTS to prevent duplicates.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?) IF NOT EXISTS
operations.query_desc: Attempt to insert duplicate record, which should be ignored.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, code, credited FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate that the initial record remains unchanged after the duplicate insert attempt.

success_message: Record inserted and validated successfully without duplication.
failure_message: Duplicate record insertion failed to respect IF NOT EXISTS clause.

title: Insert Special Characters
description: Insert a record containing special characters to verify if text fields can handle non-alphanumeric characters.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with special characters in 'name'.

operations.query: SELECT name FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate insertion of special characters.

success_message: Special characters inserted and validated successfully.
failure_message: Failed to handle special characters in text fields.

title: Insert with Empty String
description: Insert a record with an empty string to verify if the system accepts empty strings for text fields.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty string for 'name'.

expected_result.error_message: invalid null value in condition for column name

success_message: Empty string inserted and validated successfully.
failure_message: Failed to insert or validate empty string.

title: Negative Test Cases for Insert Operations
description: This test suite covers various negative scenarios for INSERT operations to ensure the system correctly handles errors.

operations.query: INSERT INTO user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Attempt to insert without specifying a keyspace.

expected_result.error_message: invalid input paramaters found for keyspace

operations.query: INSERT INTO randomkeyspace.user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Attempt to insert with an incorrect keyspace name.

expected_result.error_message: keyspace randomkeyspace does not exist

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.random_table (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Attempt to insert into a nonexistent table within a valid keyspace.

expected_result.error_message: table random_table does not exist

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, random_column, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Attempt to insert with an incorrect column name in a valid table.

expected_result.error_message: Undefined column name random_column in table bigtabledevinstance.user_info

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Attempt to insert with missing partition or clustering keys.

expected_result.error_message: Some partition key parts are missing: age

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Attempt to insert with a null value for a non-nullable column.

expected_result.error_message: invalid null value in condition for column name

success_message: Records successfully validated for error handling.
failure_message: Failed to detect duplication errors as expected.

title: Insert and Validate Record with Question mark
description: This test case inserts a record into the 'user_info' table with basic datatypes with `?` in value and validates its presence through a SELECT query to ensure correct insertion.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with all supported datatypes.

operations.query: SELECT name, age FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate the inserted record by selecting and comparing all values.

success_message: Record with basic datatypes with `?` value inserted and validated successfully.
failure_message: Failed to validate record with basic datatypes with `?` value or data mismatch found.

title: Insert only primary key value
description: This test case inserts a record into the 'user_info' table with only the primary key value and validates its presence through a SELECT query to ensure correct insertion.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age) VALUES (?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with only primary key value.

expected_result.error_message: rpc error: code = InvalidArgument desc = No mutations provided

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, map_text_int) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with only primary key value with empty map.

expected_result.error_message: rpc error: code = InvalidArgument desc = No mutations provided

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, extra_info) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with only primary key value with empty map.

expected_result.error_message: rpc error: code = InvalidArgument desc = No mutations provided

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, list_text) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty list<text>.

expected_result.error_message: error building insert prepare query:error decoding string to list<varchar> value: EOF

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, list_int) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty list<int>.

expected_result.error_message: error building insert prepare query:error decoding string to list<int> value: EOF

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, list_bigint) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty list<bigint>.

expected_result.error_message: error building insert prepare query:error decoding string to list<bigint> value: EOF

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, list_float) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty list<float>.

expected_result.error_message: error building insert prepare query:error decoding string to list<float> value: EOF

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, list_double) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty list<double>.

expected_result.error_message: error building insert prepare query:error decoding string to list<double> value: EOF

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, list_boolean) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty list<boolean>.

expected_result.error_message: error building insert prepare query:error decoding string to list<boolean> value: EOF

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, ts_text_map) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty map<text,timestamp>.

expected_result.error_message: rpc error: code = InvalidArgument desc = No mutations provided

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, ts_float_map) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty map<timestamp,float>.

expected_result.error_message: rpc error: code = InvalidArgument desc = No mutations provided

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, ts_int_map) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty map<timestamp,int>.

expected_result.error_message: rpc error: code = InvalidArgument desc = No mutations provided

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, ts_boolean_map) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty map<timestamp,boolean>.

expected_result.error_message: rpc error: code = InvalidArgument desc = No mutations provided

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, ts_double_map) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty map<timestamp,double>.

expected_result.error_message: rpc error: code = InvalidArgument desc = No mutations provided

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, ts_bigint_map) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty map<timestamp,bigint>.

expected_result.error_message: rpc error: code = InvalidArgument desc = No mutations provided

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, ts_text_map) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with empty map<timestamp,text>.

expected_result.error_message: rpc error: code = InvalidArgument desc = No mutations provided

success_message: Insert operation completed successfully for all test cases.
failure_message: Insert operation failed for at least one test case.
